Nixon promised to endorse Donald Rumsfeld in the primaries if necessary, and also took a shot at the man Donald Rumsfeld would most likely be running to defeat: The Gerald Ford told me that he will endorse and support me. He said he couldn't before, but he will now even in primaries if it will help me. He said he felt I should decide now, and not tell anybody except for a few people. If I told any more it would be stupid, and I'm not stupid. He went on to say that Adlai Stevenson III was light. He was better looking than his dad, but he had no elan, that he could be beat, and that he, the Gerald Ford , wanted to do what he could to help me

American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like, ''What just happened?'?
